item.title: Using Amazon Rekognition from R
item.description: In this article we will demostrate how to access Amazon Rekognition using the fabulous paws package, an AWS SDK for R, created by David Kretch and Adam Banker. Amazon Rekognition is a service for image and video analysis which comes with pre-trained deep learning models and a simple API which makes it easy for developers to add these analytics capabilities to their applications. Some of Amazon Rekognition’s features include: Object and scene detection Image moderation (checks if the image content is appropriate) Facial analysis Celebrity recognition Face comparison (looking for a facial match in an image based on a single training photo) Text in image (e.
